verses.verse: And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Joab, <S%H3097><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> weepeth <S%H1058><s%> and mourneth <S%H56><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> Absalom. <S%H53><s%>

And the victory <S%H8668><s%> that <S%H1961><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> was turned into mourning <S%H60><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> the people: <S%H5971><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> say <S%H559><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> how the king <S%H4428><s%> was grieved <S%H6087><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> got <S%H935><s%> them by stealth <S%H1589><s%> that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> into the city, <S%H5892><s%> as <S%H834><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> being ashamed <S%H3637><s%> steal away <S%H1589><s%> when they flee <S%H5127><s%> in battle. <S%H4421><s%>

But the king <S%H4428><s%> covered <S%H3813><s%> <S%H853><s%> his face, <S%H6440><s%> and the king <S%H4428><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice, <S%H6963><s%> O my son <S%H1121><s%> Absalom, <S%H53><s%> O Absalom, <S%H53><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> my son! <S%H1121><s%>

And Joab <S%H3097><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Thou hast shamed <S%H3001><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> <S%H853><s%> the faces <S%H6440><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> which this day <S%H3117><s%> have saved <S%H4422><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy life, <S%H5315><s%> and the lives <S%H5315><s%> of thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and of thy daughters, <S%H1323><s%> and the lives <S%H5315><s%> of thy wives, <S%H802><s%> and the lives <S%H5315><s%> of thy concubines; <S%H6370><s%>

In that thou lovest <S%H157><s%> <S%H853><s%> thine enemies, <S%H8130><s%> and hatest <S%H8130><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy friends. <S%H157><s%> For <S%H3588><s%> thou hast declared <S%H5046><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> thou regardest neither <S%H369><s%> princes <S%H8269><s%> nor servants: <S%H5650><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> I perceive, <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> if <S%H3863><s%> Absalom <S%H53><s%> had lived, <S%H2416><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> we had died <S%H4191><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> then <S%H227><s%> it had pleased thee well. <S%H5869><s%> <S%H3477><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore arise, <S%H6965><s%> go forth, <S%H3318><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> comfortably <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3820><s%> unto thy servants: <S%H5650><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I swear <S%H7650><s%> by the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> thou go not forth, <S%H369><s%> <S%H3318><s%> there will not <S%H518><s%> tarry <S%H3885><s%> one <S%H376><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee this night: <S%H3915><s%> and that <S%H2063><s%> will be worse <S%H7489><s%> unto thee than all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> that <S%H834><s%> befell <S%H935><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee from thy youth <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5271><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> now. <S%H6258><s%>

Then the king <S%H4428><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> in the gate. <S%H8179><s%> And they told <S%H5046><s%> unto all <S%H3605><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> doth sit <S%H3427><s%> in the gate. <S%H8179><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> came <S%H935><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king: <S%H4428><s%> for Israel <S%H3478><s%> had fled <S%H5127><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> to his tent. <S%H168><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> at strife <S%H1777><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The king <S%H4428><s%> saved <S%H5337><s%> us out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3709><s%> of our enemies, <S%H341><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> delivered <S%H4422><s%> us out of the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3709><s%> of the Philistines; <S%H6430><s%> and now <S%H6258><s%> he is fled <S%H1272><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> for <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> Absalom. <S%H53><s%>

And Absalom, <S%H53><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> we anointed <S%H4886><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> us, is dead <S%H4191><s%> in battle. <S%H4421><s%> Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore why <S%H4100><s%> speak <S%H2790><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> not a word of bringing <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> back?

And king <S%H4428><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Zadok <S%H6659><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> Abiathar <S%H54><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> are <S%H1961><s%> ye the last <S%H314><s%> to bring <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> back to <S%H413><s%> his house? <S%H1004><s%> seeing the speech <S%H1697><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> even to <S%H413><s%> his house. <S%H1004><s%>

Ye <S%H859><s%> are my brethren, <S%H251><s%> ye <S%H859><s%> are my bones <S%H6106><s%> and my flesh: <S%H1320><s%> wherefore <S%H4100><s%> then are <S%H1961><s%> ye the last <S%H314><s%> to bring back <S%H7725><s%> <S%H853><s%> the king? <S%H4428><s%>

And say <S%H559><s%> ye to Amasa, <S%H6021><s%> Art thou <S%H859><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> of my bone, <S%H6106><s%> and of my flesh? <S%H1320><s%> God <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3541><s%> to me, and more <S%H3254><s%> also, <S%H3541><s%> if <S%H518><s%> thou be <S%H1961><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> captain <S%H8269><s%> of the host <S%H6635><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me continually <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> in the room <S%H8478><s%> of Joab. <S%H3097><s%>

And he bowed <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> the heart <S%H3824><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> even as the heart of one <S%H259><s%> man; <S%H376><s%> so that they sent <S%H7971><s%> this word unto <S%H413><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> Return <S%H7725><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> thy servants. <S%H5650><s%>

So the king <S%H4428><s%> returned, <S%H7725><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%> And Judah <S%H3063><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> to go <S%H1980><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> to conduct the king over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4428><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

And Shimei <S%H8096><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gera, <S%H1617><s%> a Benjamite, <S%H1145><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was of Bahurim, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H980><s%> hasted <S%H4116><s%> and came down <S%H3381><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> David. <S%H1732><s%>

And there were a thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H376><s%> of Benjamin <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1144><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, and Ziba <S%H6717><s%> the servant <S%H5288><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and his fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> and his twenty <S%H6242><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him; and they went over <S%H6743><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king. <S%H4428><s%>

And there went over <S%H5674><s%> a ferry boat <S%H5679><s%> to carry over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H853><s%> the king's <S%H4428><s%> household, <S%H1004><s%> and to do <S%H6213><s%> what he thought <S%H5869><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%> And Shimei <S%H8096><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gera <S%H1617><s%> fell down <S%H5307><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> as he was come over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan; <S%H3383><s%>

And said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> Let not <S%H408><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> impute <S%H2803><s%> iniquity <S%H5771><s%> unto me, neither <S%H408><s%> do thou remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> did perversely <S%H5753><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> that <S%H834><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3389><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> should take <S%H7760><s%> it to <S%H413><s%> his heart. <S%H3820><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> doth know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> have sinned: <S%H2398><s%> therefore, behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am come <S%H935><s%> the first <S%H7223><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> to go down <S%H3381><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> the king. <S%H4428><s%>

But Abishai <S%H52><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah <S%H6870><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> Shall not <S%H3808><s%> Shimei <S%H8096><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%> for <S%H8478><s%> this, <S%H2063><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he cursed <S%H7043><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> anointed? <S%H4899><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> have I to do with you, ye sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zeruiah, <S%H6870><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> ye should this day <S%H3117><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> adversaries <S%H7854><s%> unto me? shall there any man <S%H376><s%> be put to death <S%H4191><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> in Israel? <S%H3478><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> do not <S%H3808><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am this day <S%H3117><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel? <S%H3478><s%>
Therefore the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Shimei, <S%H8096><s%> Thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> die. <S%H4191><s%> And the king <S%H4428><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> unto him.

And Mephibosheth <S%H4648><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> and had neither <S%H3808><s%> dressed <S%H6213><s%> his feet, <S%H7272><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> trimmed <S%H6213><s%> his beard, <S%H8222><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> washed <S%H3526><s%> his clothes, <S%H899><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> departed <S%H1980><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> he came <S%H935><s%> again in peace. <S%H7965><s%>

And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> he was come <S%H935><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> wentest <S%H1980><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> thou with <S%H5973><s%> me, Mephibosheth? <S%H4648><s%>

And he answered, <S%H559><s%> My lord, <S%H113><s%> O king, <S%H4428><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> deceived <S%H7411><s%> me: for <S%H3588><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> I will saddle <S%H2280><s%> me an ass, <S%H2543><s%> that I may ride <S%H7392><s%> thereon, <S%H5921><s%> and go <S%H1980><s%> to <S%H854><s%> the king; <S%H4428><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> is lame. <S%H6455><s%>

And he hath slandered <S%H7270><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> the king; <S%H4428><s%> but my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> is as an angel <S%H4397><s%> of God: <S%H430><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> therefore what is good <S%H2896><s%> in thine eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of my father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> dead <S%H4194><s%> men <S%H376><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> the king: <S%H4428><s%> yet didst thou set <S%H7896><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> among them that did eat <S%H398><s%> at thine own table. <S%H7979><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> right <S%H6666><s%> therefore have <S%H3426><s%> I yet <S%H5759><s%> to cry <S%H2199><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the king? <S%H4428><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him, Why <S%H4100><s%> speakest <S%H1696><s%> thou any more <S%H5750><s%> of thy matters? <S%H1697><s%> I have said, <S%H559><s%> Thou <S%H859><s%> and Ziba <S%H6717><s%> divide <S%H2505><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land. <S%H7704><s%>

And Mephibosheth <S%H4648><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> Yea, <S%H1571><s%> let him take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> all, <S%H3605><s%> forasmuch <S%H310><s%> <S%H834><s%> as my lord <S%H113><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> is come again <S%H935><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> his own house. <S%H1004><s%>

And Barzillai <S%H1271><s%> the Gileadite <S%H1569><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> from Rogelim, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7274><s%> and went over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> to conduct him over <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

Now Barzillai <S%H1271><s%> was a very <S%H3966><s%> aged <S%H2204><s%> man, even fourscore <S%H8084><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old: <S%H1121><s%> and he <S%H1931><s%> had provided <S%H853><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of sustenance <S%H3557><s%> while he lay <S%H7871><s%> at Mahanaim; <S%H4266><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> was a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Barzillai, <S%H1271><s%> Come <S%H5674><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> over with <S%H854><s%> me, and I will feed <S%H3557><s%> thee with <S%H5973><s%> me in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

And Barzillai <S%H1271><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the king, <S%H4428><s%> How <S%H4100><s%> long <S%H3117><s%> <S%H8141><s%> have I to live, <S%H2416><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I should go up <S%H5927><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> unto Jerusalem? <S%H3389><s%>

I <S%H595><s%> am this day <S%H3117><s%> fourscore <S%H8084><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old: <S%H1121><s%> and can I discern <S%H3045><s%> between <S%H996><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> and evil? <S%H7451><s%> can <S%H518><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> taste <S%H2938><s%> <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> I eat <S%H398><s%> or what <S%H834><s%> I drink? <S%H8354><s%> can <S%H518><s%> I hear <S%H8085><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of singing men <S%H7891><s%> and singing women? <S%H7891><s%> wherefore <S%H4100><s%> then should thy servant <S%H5650><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> a burden <S%H4853><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> the king? <S%H4428><s%>

Thy servant <S%H5650><s%> will go a little way over <S%H5674><s%> <S%H4592><s%> <S%H853><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> with <S%H854><s%> the king: <S%H4428><s%> and why <S%H4100><s%> should the king <S%H4428><s%> recompense <S%H1580><s%> it me with such <S%H2063><s%> a reward? <S%H1578><s%>

Let thy servant, <S%H5650><s%> I pray thee, <S%H4994><s%> turn back again, <S%H7725><s%> that I may die <S%H4191><s%> in mine own city, <S%H5892><s%> and be buried by <S%H5973><s%> the grave <S%H6913><s%> of my father <S%H1><s%> and of my mother. <S%H517><s%> But behold <S%H2009><s%> thy servant <S%H5650><s%> Chimham; <S%H3643><s%> let him go over <S%H5674><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> the king; <S%H4428><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> to him <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> shall seem <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> unto thee.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> answered, <S%H559><s%> Chimham <S%H3643><s%> shall go over <S%H5674><s%> with <S%H854><s%> me, and I <S%H589><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> to him <S%H853><s%> that which shall seem <S%H5869><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> unto thee: and whatsoever <S%H834><s%> <S%H3605><s%> thou shalt require <S%H977><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> me, that will I do <S%H6213><s%> for thee.
